about_the_game:
Step into history and relive the monumental events of D-Day in an immersive and educational virtual reality experience. The D-Day VR Museum takes you on a compelling journey back to June 6, 1944, when Allied forces launched the largest amphibious assault in history. Explore recreated environments, witness key moments, and gain a deeper understanding of the sacrifices made by brave soldiers on this fateful day.



Features
  • Historical Artifacts: Encounter a vast collection of authentic World War II artifacts, such as weapons, uniforms, vehicles, and personal items.
  • Interactive Exhibits: Engage with interactive exhibits that provide in-depth information about the planning, execution, and aftermath of D-Day.
  • Relive History: Witness some of the most iconic locations during that very special day.
  • Full english text, videos and voiceover

*Screenshots are from a pre-alpha version and may not represent the final game.
